name: Gray Town
description:
Gray Town is a text-based adventure game based on the PC platform. Players need to find various key props in Gray Town, or lead other NPCs through some choices to reach the true ending.

In 21XX, the energy on the earth of mankind is almost exhausted, but mankind can still dance to the sky every day, and there is no night in the city. The reason is that humans have discovered a mineral called blue carbon underground. This mineral contains extremely high energy. A high-purity blue ore can provide 200 days of lighting. At the same time, FSS, an energy company using blue ore, became the government, allowing poor people to live in underground blue ore mining plants with strict regulations.

The player will play as an ordinary worker, Gray. In the next few days, he will lead the residents of Gray Town to face the increasingly strict FSS tyranny, or succumb to power, let himself go to the surface and leave Gray Town.

The goal of the game is to let players realize how terrifying the power of reporting in their hands, and hope that everyone can use the power of reporting.

The game is mainly for players who can read and have the ability to think independently. Players can try multiple endings instead of just compliant endings.

Use WASD to Move and Use AD to fight during the fighting
